name: hyperhtml-element
description: An extensible class to define hyperHTML based Custom Elements

scripts.build: npm run babel && npm run babel-test && npm run minify && npm run minify-es5 && npm run size && npm run size-es5 && npm test
scripts.size: echo $(tput bold)'Size for ES2015'$(tput sgr0); cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c min.js | wc -c
scripts.size-es5: echo $(tput bold)'Size for ES5'$(tput sgr0); cat es5.js | wc -c;cat es5.min.js | wc -c;gzip -c es5.min.js | wc -c

author: Andrea Giammarchi
